name: HEIRLOOM CARBON TECHNOLOGIES
sampleDescriptions: Educate policymakers on direct air capture (DAC) technology and build support for carbon dioxide removal (CDR) policies.
Educate and build support among policymakers for direct air capture (DAC) technology and the DAC Hubs program in P.L. 117-58, the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act. Discuss COP28 opportunities.
